metadata.title: USN-5526-1 -- PyJWT vulnerability
metadata.description: Aapo Oksman discovered that PyJWT incorrectly handled signatures constructed from SSH public keys. A remote attacker could use this to forge a JWT signature.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5526-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-jwt - 1.7.1-2ubuntu2.1 No subscription required
